metadata.Plot: Fearless racer Michel Vaillant attempts to win "24 Hours of Le Mans", the famous highly challenging and prestigious annual endurance race that lasts one whole day.
metadata.Writer: Jean Graton, Philippe Graton, Luc Besson
metadata.Actors: Sagamore StÃ©venin, Peter Youngblood Hills, Diane Kruger
